short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Resize and align the current window to the predefined position with multi-monitor support
short.de: Ändern der Größe und Ausrichten des aktuellen Fensters an der vordefinierten Position mit Unterstützung für mehrere Monitore
short.es: Redimensiona y alinea la ventana actual a la posición predefinida con soporte multimonitor
short.fr: Redimensionnement et alignement de la fenêtre actuelle à la position prédéfinie avec support multi-moniteur
short.it: Ridimensiona e allinea la finestra corrente nella posizione predefinita con supporto multi-monitor
short.ja: マルチモニターに対応した、カレントウィンドウのリサイズと定義された位置への配置
short.nl: Verander de grootte en lijn het huidige venster uit op de voorgedefinieerde positie met multi-monitor ondersteuning
short.pt_BR: Redimensionar e alinhar a janela atual para a posição pré-definida com suporte a vários monitores
short.pt_PT: Redimensionar e alinhar a janela actual para a posição predefinida com suporte multi-monitor
short.ru: Изменение размера и выравнивание текущего окна по заданному положению с поддержкой нескольких мониторов
short.zh_CN: 调整当前窗口的大小并将其对齐到预定义的位置，支持多显示器

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This is a powerful layout resizer extension for browser windows. This extension enables the user to adjust the current window's layout size based on the pre-defined set or any new custom dimension. Each dimension is visually shown in a toolbar popup for easy access. The extension gets left, top, right, and bottom positions in percent unit and changes the window size to these values. This extension detects all the monitors in your system and allows one of the monitors to be the reference for the alignment. Also, this extension supports keyboard shortcuts for the first six alignments in the popup. It means that you can re-align to any of these six alignments without opening the popup and just by pressing a user-defined keyboard set. Each item in the popup is draggable. The user can change the arrangement of the items or even remove or add new items.

Features:
1. Supports percent values. So it is compatible with different monitors
2. Automatically fill the current window size when the popup is open. This way, you can add this layout size to the table without any configuration needed.
3. Supports layout adjustment by moving blocks around.
4. Supports import and export options to sync settings between different browsers.
5. Written on top of manifest version 3. The extension is completely idle when it is not active (no resource usage).
6. You can define a custom window size for the startup. Once the extension loads, it sets this user-defined window size for the currently active window.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_CN:
A simple yet powerful layout resizer extension for browser windows. This extension enables the user to adjust the current window's layout size based on the pre-defined set or any new custom dimension. Each dimension is visually shown in a toolbar popup for easy access. The extension gets left, top, right, and bottom positions in percent unit and changes the window size to these values. This extension detects all the monitors in your system and allows one of the monitors to be the reference for the alignment. Also, this extension supports keyboard shortcuts for the first six alignments in the popup. It means that you can re-align to any of these six alignments without opening the popup and just by pressing a user-defined keyboard set. Each item in the popup is draggable. The user can change the arrangement of the items or even remove or add new items.

Note: This extension uses a non-persistent background script to be completely idle when it is not active

As of version 0.1.4, you can define a custom window size for the startup. Once the extension loads, it sets this user-defined window size for the currently active window.
